doc:
Alan Campbell (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alan_Campbell_(actor) 0 Bruce Alan Campbell (born April 22, 1957), credited professionally as Alan Campbell, is an American television, film and stage actor who is best known for his roles as Derek Mitchell in the 1987–1992 CBS series Jake and the Fatman and as E.Z. Taylor on the short-lived 1984–1985 Three's Company spin-off Three's a Crowd. Bruce_Alan_Campbell ( born April_22_,_1957 ) , credited professionally as Alan_Campbell , is an_American_television_,_film_and_stage_actor who is_best_known for his_roles as Derek_Mitchell in the_1987 – 1992_CBS_series_Jake and the_Fatman and as E.Z._Taylor on the_short-lived_1984 – 1985_Three 's_Company_spin-off_Three 's_a_Crowd .
